inspirationalQuotes.text: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
inspirationalQuotes.author: William Osler

inspirationalQuotes.text: Wherever the art of Medicine is loved, there is also a love of Humanity.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Hippocrates

inspirationalQuotes.text: The art of healing comes from nature, not from the physician. Therefore the physician must start from nature, with an open mind.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Paracelsus

paretoBanner.title: Master the 20%
paretoBanner.description: Focus on the 20% of topics that will cover 80% of your exam questions. Let's start with high-yield subjects.

questionOfTheDay.question: Which of the following is the most common cause of community-acquired pneumonia?

subjects.name: Anatomy
subjects.description: The cornerstone of medical science, anatomy is the study of the structure of the human body, from macroscopic to microscopic levels.

textbooks.title: BD Chaurasia's Human Anatomy, Volume 1: Upper Limb and Thorax
textbooks.author: B.D. Chaurasia

textbooks.title: BD Chaurasia's Human Anatomy, Volume 2: Lower Limb, Abdomen, and Pelvis
textbooks.author: B.D. Chaurasia

textbooks.title: BD Chaurasia's Human Anatomy, Volume 3: Head-Neck and Brain
textbooks.author: B.D. Chaurasia

textbooks.title: Vishram Singh's Gross Anatomy, Volume 1: Upper Limb and Thorax
textbooks.author: Vishram Singh

textbooks.title: Vishram Singh's Gross Anatomy, Volume 2: Abdomen and Lower Limb
textbooks.author: Vishram Singh

textbooks.title: Vishram Singh's Gross Anatomy, Volume 3: Head, Neck, and Brain
textbooks.author: Vishram Singh

question-bank.title: Anatomy Question Bank 1
question-bank.description: A collection of 100 high-yield anatomy questions.

subjects.name: Physiology
subjects.description: Understand the function of the human body, from the molecular to the organismal level. Physiology explores the mechanisms that keep us alive.

textbooks.title: Guyton and Hall Textbook of Medical Physiology
textbooks.author: John E. Hall

textbooks.title: Ganong's Review of Medical Physiology
textbooks.author: Kim E. Barrett

subjects.name: Biochemistry
subjects.description: Explore the chemical processes within and related to living organisms. Biochemistry is the language of life at the molecular level.

textbooks.title: Textbook of Biochemistry for Medical Students
textbooks.author: DM Vasudevan

subjects.name: Pathology
subjects.description: The study of disease. Pathology bridges the gap between basic science and clinical practice.

textbooks.title: Robbins & Cotran Pathologic Basis of Disease
textbooks.author: Vinay Kumar

subjects.name: Microbiology
subjects.description: The study of microorganisms, including bacteria, viruses, fungi, and parasites, and their role in human health and disease.

textbooks.title: Essentials of Medical Microbiology
textbooks.author: Apurba Sankar Sastry

subjects.name: Pharmacology
subjects.description: The science of drugs and their effects on the body. Understand how medicines work to treat and prevent disease.

textbooks.title: Essentials of Medical Pharmacology
textbooks.author: K.D. Tripathi

subjects.name: Community Medicine
subjects.description: Focuses on the health of populations. Learn about epidemiology, biostatistics, and public health principles.

textbooks.title: Park's Textbook of Preventive and Social Medicine
textbooks.author: K. Park

subjects.name: Forensic Medicine
subjects.description: The application of medical knowledge to legal questions. Explore topics like toxicology, autopsy, and injury interpretation.

textbooks.title: The Essentials of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology
textbooks.author: K.S. Narayan Reddy

subjects.name: ENT
subjects.description: The study of diseases of the Ear, Nose, and Throat. A specialized field with a wide range of medical and surgical treatments.

textbooks.title: Diseases of Ear, Nose and Throat & Head and Neck Surgery
textbooks.author: PL Dhingra

subjects.name: Ophthalmology
subjects.description: The branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of disorders and diseases of the eye.

textbooks.title: Comprehensive Ophthalmology
textbooks.author: A. K. Khurana

subjects.name: General Medicine
subjects.description: The medical specialty dedicated to the diagnosis and medical treatment of adults.

textbooks.title: Davidson's Principles and Practice of Medicine
textbooks.author: Stuart H. Ralston

subjects.name: General Surgery
subjects.description: A surgical specialty that focuses on abdominal contents including esophagus, stomach, small intestine, large intestine, liver, pancreas, gallbladder, appendix and bile ducts, and often the thyroid gland.

textbooks.title: Bailey & Love's Short Practice of Surgery
textbooks.author: Norman S. Williams

subjects.name: Obstetrics & Gynaecology
subjects.description: Two surgical-medical specialties dealing with the female reproductive organs in their pregnant and non-pregnant state, respectively.

textbooks.title: DC Dutta's Textbook of Obstetrics
textbooks.author: Hiralal Konar

subjects.name: Pediatrics
subjects.description: The branch of medicine that involves the medical care of infants, children, and adolescents.

textbooks.title: Ghai Essential Pediatrics
textbooks.author: O.P. Ghai

subjects.name: Orthopedics
subjects.description: The branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the musculoskeletal system.

textbooks.title: Essential Orthopaedics
textbooks.author: J. Maheshwari

subjects.name: Radiology
subjects.description: A medical specialty that uses imaging to diagnose and treat diseases seen within the body.

subjects.name: Anesthesiology
subjects.description: The medical specialty concerned with the total perioperative care of patients before, during and after surgery.

subjects.name: Psychiatry
subjects.description: The medical specialty devoted to the diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of mental disorders.

subjects.name: Dermatology
subjects.description: The branch of medicine dealing with the skin, nails, hair and its diseases.
